com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao

Interface ReadDao<T extends SdkModel>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Data model type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Closeable, CloudDao, ModelDao<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CrudDao<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCampaignDeviceMetadataDao, AbstractCampaignStatisticsDao, AbstractCampaignStatisticsEventsDao, AbstractCertificateIssuerDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentBulkCreateDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentBulkDeleteDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentDenialDao, AbstractFirmwareImageDao, AbstractFirmwareManifestDao, AbstractPreSharedKeyDao, AbstractSubtenantApiKeyDao, AbstractSubtenantTrustedCertificateDao, AbstractSubtenantUserDao, AbstractSubtenantUserInvitationDao, AccountDao, ApiKeyDao, CampaignDeviceMetadataDao, CampaignStatisticsDao, CampaignStatisticsEventsDao, CertificateEnrollmentDao, CertificateIssuerConfigDao, CertificateIssuerDao, DeveloperCertificateDao, DeviceDao, DeviceEnrollmentBulkCreateDao, DeviceEnrollmentBulkDeleteDao, DeviceEnrollmentDao, DeviceEnrollmentDenialDao, DeviceEventsDao, FirmwareImageDao, FirmwareManifestDao, PreSharedKeyDao, SubtenantApiKeyDao, SubtenantTrustedCertificateDao, SubtenantUserDao, SubtenantUserInvitationDao, TrustedCertificateDao, UpdateCampaignDao, UserDao, UserInvitationDao

    @Preamble(description="Data Access Object definition for reading")
public interface ReadDao<T extends SdkModel>
extends ModelDao<T>
    Data access object (DAO) definition for read persistence actions.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        T read(java.lang.String id)
throws MbedCloudException,
       java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Fetches data from the Cloud.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the model as defined by SdkModel.getId().
        Returns:
        fetched data model
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if it is not possible to read a model by just setting the identifier.

      • read

        T read()
throws MbedCloudException
        Fetches data from the Cloud.

        Note: Similar to read(String) but the underlying identifier value set using ModelDao.setId(String) is used.

        Returns:
        fetched data model
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process.
